au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.util
Class InputStreamEncoder

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.util.InputStreamEncoder

public class InputStreamEncoder
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a static method for encoding an input stream into base64, giving all plugins a single, common method for doing so. created 01/03/2007 xena Short desc of class:
